fields.summary: ListView searchView property throws error if set in XML

comments.body:
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/422

Test app: test/apps/testing/ALOY-1033

Functional test:

1. Run the app (should see no errors in console or app). Tap in the search box and search for items (should work).
2. Edit the app's index.xml to move the <SearchBar> within the <ListView>. Run the app and it should work as before.
Tested Tim's PR, functional tests passed.

Master: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/554
1_5_X: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/555

Update the test app to reflect the platform differences, such that the SearchBar is outside the list for iOS and inside the list for Android.
